remarks: Any operation is associative outside its domain, if the domain doesn't contain the empty set.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-1995.)
statement:

ndmov.5 $e |- -. (/) e. S $.
ndmovass $p |- ( -. ( A e. S /\ B e. S /\ C e. S ) -> ( ( A F B ) F C ) = ( A F ( B F C ) ) ) $.
